item.description:
We're going to be in NH anyway so why not take the opportunity to zip??
See link for details- http://www.alpinezipl...

If more than 13 want to go we can open a second tour.

Jennifer Duffy from Alpine Adventures will take your reservation. They are giving us a 10% discount. Please call Jenny to make your reservation. Tell her you are with our group (RI Outdoor Adventure Club).

Jenny Duffy
Office Manager & Group Adventures
Alpine Adventures Outdoor Recreation
41 Main St / POB 1059
Lincoln, NH 03251
Office:(603)745-9911
Fax:(603)745-2630
jenny@alpinezipline.com
www.alpinezipline.com




MEMORIAL DAY WEEKEND TRIP:
We have events in the White Mountains on Saturday, Sunday, and Monday. An easy hike on Saturday at Frankenstein Cliffs and Arethusa Falls, a challenging one on Sunday as we summit Mts Pierce and Jackson, and a fun day zip lining on Monday. Feel free to join us for any of the events or all three. There are plenty of places to stay nearby. I rented a cabin for myself for 65 dollars a night here:
http://www.abetterlif...
There are also a couple of campgrounds nearby that are about 30 bucks a night (assuming 2 adults per campground, 10 bucks for additional adults up to 4 total)
http://www.beechhill....
http://www.crawfordno...
Plus the AMC highland center is nearby, I think its 90 bucks a night:
http://www.outdoors.o...
These locations are all near the two hikes, the zip lining is in Lincoln, about 40 minutes from area where the hikes are.
item.name: Memorial Day Weekend Trip: Zip Lining
